subject: Re: [junit] is pair programming pratical?
msgSnippet: This probably belongs on extremeprogramming (also at Yahoo! Groups) rather than junit. Short answer: Pairing works great, but some people have difficulty with
messageBody:
This probably belongs on extremeprogramming (also at Yahoo! Groups)
rather than junit.

Short answer: Pairing works great, but some people have difficulty with
it. Generally, the challenges are because they fear the constant
review, don't want to share their work, or are concerned about possible
pair conflicts. I think the best way to address these is to try pairing
rather than speculate about what *might* go wrong.

Regards,

Rob
